 Career Profile 
Having 5 Years of work experience in Electrical switchgear industries.
Also worked to prepare all control & protection schematics for Switchgear & control panels.
Both practical as well as theoretical knowledge of Different Electrical instruments.
Safety process oriented along with proven technical and training skills.
 Key Projects Handled
Project 1: (2014-2017)
Designation: Electrical Engineer (Switchgear)
Responsibities
Independently prepare G.A, SLD BOM of switchgear and control panels.
Also worked to prepare all control & protection schematics for Switchgear & control panels.
Handling of electrical load as per requirement.
Analysis of electrical consumption & consumed demand.
Daily maintain the power consumption report.
Weekly preparing the formats of preventive maintenance.
Line substation maintenance and breakdown.
Replacement of faulty Equipment and DG sets and station, aux transformer maintenance.
Monthly billing. Battery bank, charger weekly maintenance.
Rising invoice for billing. Safety and quality auditing.
Customer query rectification
Reporting to Electrical manager

Designation: Electrical Engineer Trainee (Switchgear)
Responsibilities
Independently prepare G.A, SLD BOM of switchgear and control panels.

 Daily maintain the power consumption report.

(230KV) HT, Main receiving circuit breaker.

Transformer (2*100MVA).
 Employers

Headquartered in kudimangalan, Tamilnadu, Projects-erection and de-erection of wind mills. 
And Switching,controlling and protection of power station.

Designated as Electrical Engineer (Switchgear).
